n = int(raw_input())
for t in range(n):
    a = []
    x = int(raw_input())
    a = map(int, raw_input().split())
    for i in range(x-1):
        if i % 2 == 0:
            if a[i] > a[i+1]:
                a[i], a[i+1] = a[i+1], a[i]
        else:
            if a[i] < a[i+1]:
                a[i], a[i+1] = a[i+1], a[i]
    print " ".join(str(e) for e in a)
